definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES1
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"ap_"^TO_STRING(i), visibility: IF (i:ran(landing_sequence) or i : ran(dragged_airplane)) & zoomLevel >= i THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END, `fill-opacity`:IF i : ran(dragged_airplane) & dragged_airplane~[{i}] /= landing_sequence~[{i}] THEN 0.4 ELSE 1.0 END)}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES2
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"minute_"^TO_STRING(i), visibility: IF (i : ran(landing_sequence) or i : ran(dragged_airplane)) & zoomLevel >= i THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END, y:IF (i : ran(landing_sequence) or i : ran(dragged_airplane)) & i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) + 5 ELSE 0 END)}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES3
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"line_left_"^TO_STRING(i), y1:IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END, y2:IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END, visibility:IF i <= zoomLevel THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END)}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES4
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"line_right_"^TO_STRING(i), y1:IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END, y2:IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END, visibility:IF i <= zoomLevel THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END)}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES5
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"bl_"^TO_STRING(i), fill:IF i : blockedTime THEN "yellow" ELSE "#008000" END, visibility:IF i <= zoomLevel THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END, height:TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) - 2, y:IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) + 1 ELSE 0 END )}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES6
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"mv_"^TO_STRING(i), visibility:IF i <= zoomLevel THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END, height:TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) - 2, y: IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) + 1 ELSE 0 END )}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES7
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"rect_ap_"^TO_STRING(i), y:IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) - 20 ELSE 0 END, stroke:IF i : ran(landing_sequence) THEN IF landing_sequence~(i) : held_airplanes THEN "red" ELSIF landing_sequence~(i) : selectedAirplane THEN "grey" ELSE "black" END ELSIF i : ran(dragged_airplane) THEN "white" ELSE "black" END, `stroke-width`:IF i : ran(landing_sequence) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END, fill:IF i : ran(dragged_airplane) & dragged_airplane~[{i}] /= landing_sequence~[{i}] THEN "white" ELSE "black" END)}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES8
definitions.value: {i•i:1..45|rec(`id`:"poly_ap_"^TO_STRING(i),  points:conc(["300,", INT_TO_STRING(IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END), " 325,", INT_TO_STRING(IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END + 20), " 325,", INT_TO_STRING(IF i : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(i) ELSE 0 END - 20)]), fill:IF i : ran(dragged_airplane) & dragged_airplane~[{i}] /= landing_sequence~[{i}] THEN "white" ELSE "black" END)}

definitions.name: VISB_SVG_UPDATES
definitions.value: ran(%(i,j).(i:1..999/scaling & j:1..799/scaling|rec(`id`:"pixel_"^TO_STRING(i)^"_"^TO_STRING(j), fill: {nothing_pos |-> "none", hold_button_pos |-> "red", zoom_slider_pos |-> "blue", airplane_pos |-> "white", block_time_pos |-> "yellow"}( ((POINTS * {nothing_pos}) <+ ui_element_at_point)(i*scaling |-> j*scaling) ))))

items.value: IF AIRPLANES%0 : dom(landing_sequence) & zoomLevel >= landing_sequence(AIRPLANES%0) THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END
IF AIRPLANES%0 : dom(landing_sequence) THEN bottomY - landing_sequence(AIRPLANES%0) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) ELSE 0 END
IF AIRPLANES%0 : dom(dragged_airplane) & zoomLevel >= dragged_airplane(AIRPLANES%0) THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END
IF AIRPLANES%0 : dom(dragged_airplane) THEN bottomY - dragged_airplane(AIRPLANES%0) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) ELSE 0 END
IF %0 : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(%0) ELSE 0 END
IF card(selectedAirplane) = 0 or #a.(a : held_airplanes & a : selectedAirplane) THEN "hidden" ELSE "visible" END
IF timeout = TRUE THEN "visible" ELSE "hidden" END

IF block_time_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 210 ELSIF airplane_pos = currentMousePosition THEN IF dragging_airplane = TRUE THEN 285 ELSE 430 END ELSIF hold_button_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 740 ELSIF zoom_slider_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 713 + 40 * (MU(mousePositionZoomSlider)/5 - 3) ELSE 500 END

IF block_time_pos = currentMousePosition THEN IF MU(mousePositionBlockSlot) : dom(TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)) THEN TIME_YS_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel)(MU(mousePositionBlockSlot)) + 1 ELSE 0 END ELSIF airplane_pos = currentMousePosition THEN IF MU(mousePositionAirplane) : dom(dragged_airplane) THEN bottomY - dragged_airplane(MU(mousePositionAirplane)) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) ELSIF MU(mousePositionAirplane) : dom(landing_sequence) THEN bottomY - landing_sequence(MU(mousePositionAirplane)) * TIME_SLOT_HEIGHT_BY_ZOOM(zoomLevel) ELSE 0 END ELSIF hold_button_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 510 ELSIF zoom_slider_pos = currentMousePosition THEN 75 ELSE 500 END
